quote: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The goal of a successful business is not to accumulate money, but to create value.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Balancing your money is the key to having enough.
author: Elizabeth Warren

quote: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The secret to wealth is simple: Find a way to do more for others than anyone else does.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: The art of managing money is more about understanding human behavior than numbers.
author: Morgan Housel

quote: Opportunities come infrequently. When it rains gold, put out the bucket, not the thimble.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
author: P.T. Barnum

quote: The best investment you can make is in yourself.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: In business, the idea of measuring what you are doing, picking the measurements that count, like customer satisfaction and performance, you thrive on that.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Profit in business comes from repeat customers, customers that boast about your product and service, and that bring friends with them.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The more your money works for you, the less you have to work for money.
author: Idowu Koyenikan
